html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-13062022-12-07,  ,  PMO,  , 
ActOfficial Residences Act
SubjectOrder Fixing the Remuneration and Conditions of Employment of a Member of the Staff at the Prime Minister’s Residence (Mirka Bell)
PrecisOrder fixing the remuneration and conditions of employment of MIRKA BELL, a member of the household staff at the Prime Minister’s residence, which salary is within the range of $54,878 to $61,379 per annum, effective October 20, 2022.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Order Fixing the Remuneration and Conditions of Employment of a Member of the Staff at the Prime Minister’s Residence (Mirka Bell)
precis: Order fixing the remuneration and conditions of employment of MIRKA BELL, a member of the household staff at the Prime Minister’s residence, which salary is within the range of $54,878 to $61,379 per annum, effective October 20, 2022.
